name: townhall-qa-poll
description: Web application to collect and rank employee questions for town hall meetings

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start:frontend:prod: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.pm2:build: cd frontend && VITE_USE_PROXY=false VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3001 npm run build
scripts.pm2:build:proxy: cd frontend && VITE_USE_PROXY=true VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3001 npm run build
scripts.pm2:start: npm run pm2:build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.pm2:start:prod: npm run pm2:build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.pm2:start:prod:proxy: npm run pm2:build:proxy && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production_proxy
scripts.pm2:restart: npm run pm2:build && pm2 restart ecosystem.config.js --update-env
scripts.pm2:restart:prod: npm run pm2:build && pm2 restart ecosystem.config.js --update-env --env production
scripts.pm2:restart:prod:proxy: npm run pm2:build:proxy && pm2 restart ecosystem.config.js --update-env --env production_proxy
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:backend:watch & npm run test:frontend:watch
